title: Photostat, "Design and floor plan for Le Cottage Populaire", ca. 1907
medium: Photostat, pen and brown ink on paper
signed: Signed lower right in brown ink: Paris le/ L'architecte/ Hector Guimard
inscribed:
Top in brown ink: LE COTTAGE POPULAIRE/ TYPE NO.  PAVILLON ISOLE
Below, above floor plan on far left in brown ink: FONDATIONS
Below, above center floor plan in brown ink: REZ DE CHAUSSEE
Below, above floor plan on far right in brown ink: PREMIER ETAGE
description: Design and floor plan for the Cottage Populaire. On top, a sketch of the elevation of the building, surrounded by vegetation. Below, floor plans depicting the interior of the cottage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, "Design and floor plan for Le Cottage Populaire", ca. 1907.
ca. 1907. Photostat, pen and brown ink on paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-91.
